definition: (Tw) to combat (bullying, money laundering etc)/to counter
to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]

sentences.english: Objective To scientifically prevent indoor harmful mice and effectively control mouse transmission diseases.
sentences.chinese: 目的科學防制室內害鼠，有效控制鼠傳疾病。

sentences.english: Objectives To reveal the methods of ticks control in hill areas.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲探索江蘇省丘陵山區蜱的有效防制方法。

sentences.english: Epidemic Status and Countermeasure of Clonorchiasis in Guangxi;
sentences.chinese: 提出了“成癮型”流行區華支睾吸蟲病的防制對策。

sentences.english: Pyrethroids used to control Blattella germanica on ships should be attended.
sentences.chinese: 選用擬除蟲菊酯防制艦艇上的德國小蠊應引起注意。
